comment: easiest summer course ever. everything is open day 1. Submitted everything by week 2 and got a free A+

The only assignments were a 700 word reflection essay due every two weeks. It's based on the lecture videos and readings provided. Very easy I ended the class with 100%. She responds quickly to emails and she also gives extra credit if you do discussion posts. I definitely recommend this course.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Considering this was an online course, it was generally easy. It is just essay based and as long as you do the essay's, its an easy A. She gives you 2 weeks to review the lecture and the articles that she provides, and just using the articles and connecting it to the topics for the week, you'll pass.

Love this professor. In her lecture videos you can tell she's very passionate about what she teaches. This class was very east for me, but only because I would prefer "essays" over tests. You have two weeks to read the material and write about it. There are no tests but what you learn is so interesting. She responds quick to emails. Grades easy

She is very nice and will work with you. The class is very easy, though it can be a little inconvenient to be in a 2 hour zoom meeting. There's a mid term and a final and 8 reflections- that's it. I got married at the end of last semester and didn't finish the course and she let me complete everything at a later time. I def recommend this course!
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: She was a super easy professor. The class consists of 8 self reflections which is your personal experience with the modules concept. Each reflection is due every other week. She gives a clear example of what she wants, and really only grades on your personal reflection. I haven't finished this class yet but know I will get an A.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Graded by few things

comment: Professor Burton class was very easy and she showed that she truly cares for her students. It consisted of 8 reflections and 2 exams, definitely take her if you can!!

I took Autumn Burton for Cultural Competence in Fall 2023 and it was online. She was absent for the first two weeks, did not have anything due until the third week. Her only assignments were only a one page essay about a topic. If you are trying to take an easy class that would not take a lot of time, take her.

She is an excellent example of what an online class should be like. I enjoyed her videos and guest speakers. Self-reflections are required and I would advise you to do them because if you don't your grade will reflect it. She answers emails and require class participation. I will take her again.

The sweetest professor ever. Class is very engaging and doesnt require busy work at all. She requires a self-reflection each week but as long as you do your best on them and follow directions youll do well! Other than that your grade is based on you attending class, and your participation within group discussions! Shes amazing, take her!!!
Dr. B is awesome. She makes her class so much fun.

I'm pretty sure this was the first class in this code with Dr. Burton but it has been great so far! I really liked her lectures, very insightful & opened my eyes to a lot. Love how she gives you information and lets you interpret it how you would like instead of carrying a bias. There is a lot of reading involved and about 8 self-reflection essays.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Amazing lectures
